Name: Turkish Delight Cocktail
Ingredients: 15 ml Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao
10 ml Honey syrup (3 parts honey to 1 water by weight)
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker.
Review: Rosewater, honey, chocolate and vanilla provide a distinct flavour of Turkish Delight - fortified with vodka.
History: Created in 2003 by yours truly in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Turkish Delight Cocktail contains 206 calories
